overview: In 1376, the city of Hamelin is freed from a plague of hungry rats by a mysterious  Piper who plays a tune and leads the vermin on a mery dance out of town and  straight in to the river. But the greedy city Governers refuse to pay their agreed  fee, so  the Piper wreaks a terible revenge. He plays his pipe once more, only  this time he leads all the children of Hamelin away to a magical mountain portal,  from which they never return...
title: The Pied Piper of Hamelin
